actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Transportation.
On agreeing to the Transportation amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute amends the Clean Water Act to allow States greater flexibility in setting water quality standards for so-called constructed water conveyances, that is, manmade drains, canals, and other conduits to transport water for agricultural and water supply purposes.
purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.
